name: Maiestas - Prologue
description:
Vicious black thrash in the old school vein ft. ex-Absu guitarist Dave Ward who was part of the legendary Barathrum V.I.T.R.I.O.L. album. In Maiestas, not only is he one of the guitarists, he is also the lead vocalist and along with longtime drummer Mike Rangel, bassist Joseph Herrera and guitarist Steven Frydman have unleashed their brand of blackened death thrash metal with this 5 song EP. "Prologue" is just a taste of what is to come, while reflecting on what has been.

1. The Harvesting of Blood
2. Fall To None
3. Panicking Fear
4. My Vengeance Begins
5. World's End

RELEASE DATE: 9/11/13
